name: FEED (BlipBloop)
description:
FEED is a goofy puzzle platformer created for Ludum Dare!

The game will teach you how to play, but if you get stuck or forget:

Use WASD to move.

Right mouse will move your arms towards the mouse pointer.

Pressing and holding left mouse will grab an object, releasing will throw it.

R to reload the current level.

To complete a level, feed all objects (including yourself) to the white cube monster thingy.

I'm going to be adding more levels today!
